name: Chat Example
description:
Unisave is a backend service for games created with Unity. This demo shows how Unisave Broadcasting can be used to send real-time messages from the server.

Open this page in two browser tabs, join the same chat room and test the interaction.

This demo is one of the examples included in the Unisave Asset, available on the asset store.

The source code for this example is available on GitHub, if you want to follow the in-game guide: Source Code on GitHub
